overview: Mind The Gap shows freeskiing filming at it´s highest level yet including th most spectacular follow-cam filming seen anywhere. With the feeling of gliding through the air, "skifilm" capture Charles Gagnier as he does a huge 900 tail grab at Breckenridge while Candide lives up to his big reputation doing an amazing 630 to rail. J  on Olsson does his new kangaroo flip and Andreas Haatveit does a 270 on to an incredibly long 43 step street rail. JF Houle does an amazing 70meter bio 9 mute while Grete Eliassen and Michelle Parker lay down for girls and Sweeden´s 14 year old new comer Henrik Harlaut shows his emerging talent.  Andreas Haatveit, after last year´s record high trick at June mountain, again provides a spectacular sequence doing 900 on an incredible 35 meter gap from an 8 meter kicker while the camera crew follow him right across the 35m gap, up close, in one of the most amazing ski film shots ever seen.
title: Mind the Gap
